roleset.name: involve in contention

example.name: normal usage
example.text: A majority of an NIH-appointed panel recommended late last year that the research continue under carefully controlled conditions, but [the issue]-1 became embroiled *trace*-1 in politics as anti-abortion groups continued to oppose federal funding.
example.arg: as anti-abortion groups continued to oppose federal funding.

example.name: agent, sorta
example.text: The subsequent drive to reform Hong Kong's markets also has embroiled the interest-rate futures contract.
example.arg: The subsequent drive to reform Hong Kong's markets

roleset.note: EMBROIL-V NOTES: I feel there's some sort of unstated "in controversy" in the secondexample. (from embroil.01-v)
